languages.text: {n}Тервантьяс щелкает пальцем-иглой по какому-то костяному устройству.{/n} "Саркофаг для содержания опасного образца разблокирован. Можешь забрать то, что осталось от твоего слуги".
{n}Tervantias flicks a needle finger at some kind of apparatus made of bone.{/n} "The sarcophagus for containing dangerous specimens has been unlocked. You may take what is left of your servant."
languages.original_text: {n}Тервантьяс щелкает пальцем-иглой по какому-то костяному устройству.{/n} "Саркофаг для содержания опасного образца разблокирован. Можешь забрать то, что осталось от твоего слуги".

{n}Tervantias flicks a needle finger at some kind of apparatus made of bone.{/n} "The sarcophagus for containing dangerous specimens has been unlocked. You may take what is left of your servant."

languages.text: {n}Tervantias zeigt mit einem seiner dünnen Finger auf eine Apparatur aus Knochen.{/n} "Der Sarcophagus für die Aufbewahrung gefährlicher Exemplare wurde entriegelt. Nehmt Euch, was von Eurem Dienerlein übrig ist."
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias flicks a needle finger at some kind of apparatus made of bone.{/n} "The sarcophagus for containing dangerous specimens has been unlocked. You may take what is left of your servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias zeigt mit einem seiner dünnen Finger auf eine Apparatur aus Knochen.{/n} "Der Sarcophagus für die Aufbewahrung gefährlicher Exemplare wurde entriegelt. Nehmt Euch, was von Eurem Dienerlein übrig ist."

languages.text: {n}Tervantias passe un doigt effilé sur une sorte d'appareil fait d'os.{/n} « Le sarcophage qui renferme les spécimens dangereux est débloqué. Vous pouvez récupérer ce qu'il peut bien rester de votre acolyte. »
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias flicks a needle finger at some kind of apparatus made of bone.{/n} "The sarcophagus for containing dangerous specimens has been unlocked. You may take what is left of your servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias passe un doigt effilé sur une sorte d'appareil fait d'os.{/n} « Le sarcophage qui renferme les spécimens dangereux est débloqué. Vous pouvez récupérer ce qu'il peut bien rester de votre acolyte. »

languages.text: {n}Tervantias aguijonea con un dedo un aparato hecho de hueso.{/n} «El sarcófago de contención de especímenes peligrosos queda abierto. Llévate lo que quede de tu sirviente».
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias flicks a needle finger at some kind of apparatus made of bone.{/n} "The sarcophagus for containing dangerous specimens has been unlocked. You may take what is left of your servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias aguijonea con un dedo un aparato hecho de hueso.{/n} «El sarcófago de contención de especímenes peligrosos queda abierto. Llévate lo que quede de tu sirviente».

languages.text: {n}テルヴァンティアスは、骨でできた装置のようなものに針のような指をさす。{/n}「危険な標本を収容するための棺が開かれた。お前の従者の残骸を持って行くがよい」
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias flicks a needle finger at some kind of apparatus made of bone.{/n} "The sarcophagus for containing dangerous specimens has been unlocked. You may take what is left of your servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}テルヴァンティアスは、骨でできた装置のようなものに針のような指をさす。{/n}「危険な標本を収容するための棺が開かれた。お前の従者の残骸を持って行くがよい」

languages.text: {n}特万提亚斯弹了弹尖针般的手指，指着某件骨头制成的装置。{/n}“存放危险实验样本的棺柩已经打开，你可以把仆人的残渣带走了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias flicks a needle finger at some kind of apparatus made of bone.{/n} "The sarcophagus for containing dangerous specimens has been unlocked. You may take what is left of your servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}特万提亚斯弹了弹尖针般的手指，指着某件骨头制成的装置。{/n}“存放危险实验样本的棺柩已经打开，你可以把仆人的残渣带走了。”

languages.text: {n}Tervantias, iğneli parmağıyla kemikten bir çeşit aparata basıyor.{/n} "Tehlikeli numuneleri ihtiva eden lahdin kilidi açıldı. Hizmetkârından geriye kalanları alabilirsin."
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias flicks a needle finger at some kind of apparatus made of bone.{/n} "The sarcophagus for containing dangerous specimens has been unlocked. You may take what is left of your servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias, iğneli bir parmağıyla, kemikten yapılma bir çeşit aparata basıyor.{/n} "Tehlikeli numuneleri ihtiva eden lahdin kilidi açıldı. Hizmetkârından geriye kalanları alabilirsin."
